Actions.Name: Tranquilize
Actions.AutoHit: [fray] damage and foe is pacified. Pacified foes take [D]+[fray] damage instead.

Actions.Name: Grappling Hook
Actions.Description: The [name] teleports adjacent to a summon or object in range. Alternately, it can teleport adjacent to a foe in range, then shove that foe 1.

Actions.Name: Double Time
Actions.Description: Roll 1d6. The [name] chooses a number of allies equal to half that number, then shoves them a number of spaces equal to that number in any direction.
